thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Jeffrey amd Sally DeMott

author: Jeffrey amd Sally DeMott
title: Jeffrey amd Sally DeMott
text:
Appreciate the professionalism of our agent and the outstanding quality of customer service that went above and beyond what anyone would expect.
Steve was fantastic and it was a great comfort to have someone in our
corner for a change. It is a great service that Select a Quote: offers and
we are grateful for their help.
